title: Jakarta - EE 10 - RESTEasy 6.2 - Issue with config converter not being registered in native
body:
`MultipartResourceIT.testMultipartDataIsSent` is failing in native mode because of the following issue:

```
Caused by: java.lang.IllegalArgumentException: SRCFG00013: No Converter registered for class org.jboss.resteasy.spi.config.Threshold
	at io.smallrye.config.SmallRyeConfig.requireConverter(SmallRyeConfig.java:484)
	at io.smallrye.config.SmallRyeConfig.lambda$getOptionalConverter$1(SmallRyeConfig.java:468)
	at java.util.concurrent.ConcurrentHashMap.computeIfAbsent(ConcurrentHashMap.java:1708)
	at io.smallrye.config.SmallRyeConfig.getOptionalConverter(SmallRyeConfig.java:467)
	at io.smallrye.config.SmallRyeConfig.getOptionalValue(SmallRyeConfig.java:337)
	at org.jboss.resteasy.microprofile.config.ConfigConfiguration.getOptionalValue(ConfigConfiguration.java:41)
	at org.jboss.resteasy.spi.config.Options.getProperty(Options.java:122)
	at org.jboss.resteasy.spi.config.Options.getProperty(Options.java:116)
	at org.jboss.resteasy.spi.config.Options.getValue(Options.java:72)
	at org.jboss.resteasy.spi.EntityOutputStream.<init>(EntityOutputStream.java:125)
	at org.jboss.resteasy.client.jaxrs.engines.ClientEntityOutputStream.<init>(ClientEntityOutputStream.java:50)
	at org.jboss.resteasy.client.jaxrs.engines.ManualClosingApacheHttpClient43Engine.writeRequestBodyToOutputStream(ManualClosingApacheHttpClient43Engine.java:664)
	at org.jboss.resteasy.client.jaxrs.engines.ManualClosingApacheHttpClient43Engine.buildEntity(ManualClosingApacheHttpClient43Engine.java:635)
	at org.jboss.resteasy.client.jaxrs.engines.ManualClosingApacheHttpClient43Engine.loadHttpMethod(ManualClosingApacheHttpClient43Engine.java:561)
	at org.jboss.resteasy.client.jaxrs.engines.ManualClosingApacheHttpClient43Engine.invoke(ManualClosingApacheHttpClient43Engine.java:371)
```
